abstract.para: A dataset containing all occurrences available in GBIF matching the query: { "and" : [ "Country is Brazil", "OccurrenceStatus is Present", "TaxonKey is Habenaria Willd." ] } The dataset includes records from the following constituent datasets. The full metadata for each constituent is also included in this archive: 1 records from Colección de plantas vasculares del herbario de la Universitat de València (VAL) 1 records from Universidad de Oviedo. Departamento de Biología de Organismos y Sistemas: FCO 1 records from Herbario ABH (Universidad de Alicante) 1 records from Herbario de la Universidad de Sevilla 1 records from HPAN - Herbário do Pantanal "Vali Joana Pott" 1 records from MPM Milwaukee Public Museum Herbarium 1 records from Herbarium Senckenbergianum (FR) 1 records from Universidad de Oviedo. Departamento de Biología de Organismos y Sistemas: FCO-Briof 1 records from Herbario Amazónico Colombiano 1 records from DAV - UC Davis Herbarium 1 records from CNMT - Herbário Centro Norte Mato Grossense 1 records from PEUFR - Herbário Professor Vasconcelos Sobrinho 1 records from University of Vermont, Pringle Herbarium 1 records from UCR - University of California, Riverside Herbarium - Vascular Plants 1 records from Sammlung Ernst Ule sinenumero Herbarium Hamburgense HBG 1 records from HAMAB - Herbário Amapaense 1 records from CONN 1 records from HPBR - Herbário Padre Balduino Rambo 1 records from Colección de Alismatales, Apiales, Aquifoliales, Arecales y Asparagales del Museo Botánico CORD - IMBIV 1 records from EAFM - Herbário do Instituto Federal de Educação, Ciência e Tecnologia do Amazonas 2 records from Caatinga Biome - RB - Rio de Janeiro Botanical Garden Herbarium Collection 2 records from UFG - Herbário da Universidade Federal de Goiás 2 records from DVPR - Herbário da Universidade Tecnológica Federal do Paraná - Dois Vizinhos 2 records from MEL AVH data 2 records from iNaturalist Research-grade Observations 2 records from HUSC - Herbário Unisanta 3 records from Herbarium of Vascular Plants Collection of the University of Extremadura (Spain) 3 records from IRAI - Herbário do Parque da Ciência Newton Freire Maia 3 records from MOSS - Herbário Dárdano de Andrade Lima 3 records from UESC - Herbário Universidade Estadual de Santa Cruz 3 records from MFS - Herbário Profª.
